description:
The best part of mountain biking is going down, but as they say, “what goes down, must go up.” Help young shredders up. This rope has a weight rating generous enough to tow the whole family… as long as you have the strength to pull.

  • Shock absorbing design keeps the tow rate consistent and smooth
  • Rated to 225kg (works for kids or less-fit friends)
  • Internal elastic is interwoven with durable webbing outer sheath
  • Bright colour is visible to other riders
  • Stretches from 1.7-3.3m
  • Attachment loop included
name: Kids Ride Shotgun Mountain Bike Tow Rope - Children
